template <typename Block>
 constructor Histogram(T min_value, T max_value, const_Vector<int, Block> hist)

-

This constructor, albeit not required by the VSIPL++ spec, is necessary to implement the C-VSIPL bindings.

More...

This constructor, albeit not required by the VSIPL++ spec, is necessary to implement the C-VSIPL bindings. They allow an external view to be used to accumulate the histogram values over multiple calls outside any persistent Histogram<> object / state.
